title: Edit a budget center record
content:
You can edit multiple records simultaneously by selecting them in the grid and updating them in the Preview pane on the right. For more information, see Mass update.

  1. From the main menu, select Run > Financials > Budget Centers. The Budget Centers page is displayed.

  2. Click the record identifier in the ID column to display the selected record.

  3. Click the tab you want to view or edit. The General tab is displayed by default.

    Tab Description
    General

    Displays details of the selected record. For more information, see the General tab section.
    Workflow

    Displays the workflow for the selected record. For more information about the workflow, see Budget center workflow.
    Budgets

    Displays any relevant budgets for the selected record. For more information about the budgets, see Budgets.
    Cost centers

    Displays any relevant cost centers for the selected record.

    To relate a cost center to this budget center record, click the Add icon . This displays a context-based list of suggested cost centers. Suggestions are based on keywords in the cost center and budget center titles. For example, if the title of the budget center is "HR budget center", cost centers with titles such as "HR office" will be suggested. Alternatively, you can use the search option to search for a cost center. It may take up to five minutes for a newly added cost center to appear in the search results.

    Note that both the list of suggestions and the search results display only cost centers that aren't already related to a budget center and are currently active. If all cost centers are either inactive or related to a budget center, both the list of suggestions and the search results will appear empty.

    For more information about the cost centers, see Cost Centers.
    Discussions

    Displays any relevant conversations about the selected record. For more information about discussions, see Discussions.
    History

    Displays changes to the selected record. For more information about the change history, see History.

  4. Save your changes.

General tab

This tab includes the following sections:

Details

Field Description
Title External (common) name of the budget center.
Description Description that captures the details of the budget center.
Parent Parent budget center of the current budget center record.
Code Internal code for the budget center.
Created by The name of the user who created the budget center.
Creation Time The time that the budget center record was created.

Attachments

Click Add attachment if you want to attach a file to the record.

Notes:

  • The supported attachment file formats and the maximum file size of an attachment are defined in the tenant's Application settings tab in Suite Administration.
  • If the Attachments field has been defined as encrypted for this record type and you are a member of an encryption domain, click Add encrypted attachments to attach an encrypted file to the record.
  • Attachments aren't visible in the Service Portal.
